root.name: DoomRL
root.description: OverviewDoomRL is a Roguelike version of the world famous first person shooter Doom. It contains most of the monsters, weapons and items as the original game, with the additions of perks, traits, classes, and a leveling-up system as any RPG. As of version 0.9.9.6, DoomRL has a graphical tileset which is used by default.This is a free game, where you can download it on: http://doom.chaosforge.org
